page.title: 13ROADS
page.content: MOST OF THE ROADS ARE REALLY TRACKS AND COUNTRY LANES .THERE ARE TWO MAIN ROADS ,THE A5 GOING FROM LONDON TO HOLY HEAD AND THE A483 FROM CHESTER TO SWANSEA .THE MAIN ROADS ARE VERY BUSY INFACT WE DID A SURVEY AND FOUND THAT THE A5 CARRIES ONE VEHICLE EVERY FOUR SECONDS. CHILDREN THINK THAT THE A5 IS BAD BECAUSE IT HAS NO WAYS OF GETTING ACROSS TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROAD. MOST OF THE LANES ARE IN VERY BAD CONDITION AND SOME INFACT ARE BREAKING UP AND SUBSIDING .THIS IS BECAUSE THERE IS NOT ENOUGH MONEY FROM THE GOVERNMENT , AND THE LOCAL COUNCIL CANNOT AFFORD TO MEND THEM.
